byline.docAuthor: Alberto, I.; Azcarate, C.; Mallor, F. & Mateo, P.M.

front.reference: Monografías del Semin. Matem. García de Galdeano. 27: 27–35, (2003).
front.div:
Abstract
In this work we present two new Pareto based ranking methods. We compare
them with three classical ones due to Belegundu, Goldberg and Fonseca and Flem-
ing. Furthermore, we introduce the problem of classification errors. One of the
proposed methods outperforms the others in five out of seven test problems.
front.keyword: Keywords: Multiobjective Evolutionary Algorithms. Pareto Ranking.
